subject: Fish and Other Marine Life
Fishing, Sport
Flowers and Plants
lead_paragraph: Most of the anglers on the Rio Niño try to catch machaca with spinning gear. But during the short flower season, they are frustrated to see the fish eating flowers instead of taking their lures.
snippet: Most of the anglers on the Rio Niño try to catch machaca with spinning gear. But during the short flower season, they are frustrated to see the fish eating flowers instead of taking their lures.
